passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(8) > main:nth-child(3) > section > div > div > form > header:nth-child(3) > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(5) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(5) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(5) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(5) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > h2:nth-child(1)
